    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Molecular and atomic vibrations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Molekulare und Atomerschütterungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vibrations moléculaires et atomiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vibrações molecular e atômicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vibrazioni molecolari ed atomiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοριακές και ατομικές δονήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vibraciones moleculares y atómicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that the elastic bond between two H atoms of a hydrogen molecule vibrates the molecule (a) and the molecular bonds in a solid crystal makes the crystal vibrate (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crystals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elastic bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">simple harmonic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die elastische Bindung
zwischen zwei H Atomen eines Wasserstoffmoleküls das Molekül (a) 
vibriert und die molekularen Bindungen Marken eines in den festen 
Kristalles der Kristall (b) vibrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que l'obligation 
élastique entre deux atomes de H d'une molécule d'hydrogène vibre 
la molécule (a) et les obligations moléculaires dans des marques 
pleines d'un cristal le cristal vibrent (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que a ligação 
elástica entre dois átomos de H de uma molécula do hidrogênio 
vibra a molécula (a) e as ligações molecular em makes contínuos de
um cristal o cristal vibram (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che il legame 
elastico fra due atomi di H di una molecola dell'idrogeno vibra la 
molecola (a) ed i legami molecolari nelle marche solide del cristallo 
il cristallo vibrano (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι ο ελαστικός 
δεσμός μεταξύ δύο ατόμων χ ενός μορίου υδρογόνου δονείται το 
μόριο (α) και οι μοριακοί δεσμοί σε ένα στερεό κρύσταλλο κάνουν
το κρύσταλλο να δονηθεί (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que el enlace 
elástico entre dos átomos de H de una molécula del hidrógeno vibra
la molécula (a) y los enlaces moleculares en marcas sólidas de un 
cristal el cristal vibran (b).</string>
          </description>
